sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div.padding.light(style="padding-top: 6rem")
    div.flex.wide.justify-space-between
      //- :Left
    
    //- Contents
    div.card.padding-medium.margin
      h2 Calendar
      table.wide
        tr
          td Block Days of the Week
          td
            label.margin-left-small
              input(type="checkbox" v-model="sun")
              span Sun
            label.margin-left-small
              input(type="checkbox" v-model="mon")
              span Mon
            label.margin-left-small
              input(type="checkbox" v-model="tue")
              span Tue
            label.margin-left-small
              input(type="checkbox" v-model="wed")
              span Wed
            label.margin-left-small
              input(type="checkbox" v-model="thu")
              span Thu
            label.margin-left-small
              input(type="checkbox" v-model="fri")
              span Fri
            label.margin-left-small
              input(type="checkbox" v-model="sat")
              span Sat
            button.float-right(@click="saveBlockedDays") Save Changes
        tr
          td Block Specific Dates
          td
            input(type="date" v-model="selected_date")
            button(@click="blockDate") Block
            table
              tr(v-for="blockedDate in $store.getters.blockedDates")
                td {{blockedDate.date}}
                td: button(@click="$store.dispatch('removeBlockedDate',blockedDate.blocked_dates_id)") X
          
    

    
</template>

<script>
import Modal from "@/components/reusable/modal.vue";
export default {

	components: {
		modal: Modal
	},
	methods: {
		blockDate() {
			this.$store.dispatch("blockDate", this.selected_date);
		},
		saveBlockedDays() {
			var days_array = [];
			if (this.sun) days_array.push(0);
			if (this.mon) days_array.push(1);
			if (this.tue) days_array.push(2);
			if (this.wed) days_array.push(3);
			if (this.thu) days_array.push(4);
			if (this.fri) days_array.push(5);
			if (this.sat) days_array.push(6);
			this.$store.dispatch("saveBlockedDays", "[" + days_array + "]");
		}
	},
	data() {
		return {
			selected_date: "",
			sun: false,
			mon: false,
			tue: false,
			wed: false,
			thu: false,
			fri: false,
			sat: false
		};
	},
	computed: {
		test() {
			return this.$store.getters.blockedDays;
		}
  },
  watch:{
    test(){
		this.sun = this.$store.getters.blockedDays.includes(0);
		this.mon = this.$store.getters.blockedDays.includes(1);
		this.tue = this.$store.getters.blockedDays.includes(2);
		this.wed = this.$store.getters.blockedDays.includes(3);
		this.thu = this.$store.getters.blockedDays.includes(4);
		this.fri = this.$store.getters.blockedDays.includes(5);
		this.sat = this.$store.getters.blockedDays.includes(6);
    }
  }
};
</script>
